ABOUT1: International Robotics Gaming technology, we are licensed 2022.05.11 in Dubai Economic Department under license number 954112, Our specialist engineers are created the robotics which can work in low risk management and can stable with 70-88% profit, Our project is already tested 12 month and there is nice result already, we play games like low risk Zevs, Dragon, Moon, Casinos but in low risks. maximum risk is managed by 4 risk level and in highest level even our robotics might lose 4% from investment amount but from 50 game only it might happen in 2-4 games only always invest money will give profit.
ABOUT2: In our project you can find 4 type of investing level of course let me tell you about this.
ABOUT3: 1 level is minimum investment is 100$ and daily profit is 1%  which if you make a 100$ investment, your daily  profit is 1$
ABOUT4: your 100$ investment  is in 30 days will be 130$             30 days profit.
ABOUT5: 2 level is minimum investment is 500$ and daily profit is 1.5% which if you make a 500$ investment, your daily  profit is 7.5$
ABOUT6: your 500$ investment is in 30 days will be 687.5$.         25 days profit.
ABOUT7: 3 level is minimum investment is 1000$ and daily profit is 2% which if you make a 1000 $ investment, your daily profit is 20$
ABOUT8: your 1000$ investment is in 30 days will be 1400$.        20 days profit.
ABOUT9: 4 level is minimum investment is 5000$ and daily profit is 3% which if you make a 5000$ investment, your daily profit is 150$
ABOUT10: your 5000$ investment is in 30 days will be 8000$        20 days profit.
privacy1: The international robotics gaming company is your privacy.
privacy2: About International robotics gaming technology was officially published in 2022.05.11 in Dubai, Listed in Nasdaq, GCC stock market, New York Stock exchange, LA lottery, Vegas Lottery departments,
privacy3: why do individual investors always lose their money in the lottery?
privacy4: Because human beings have emotions, once a loss occurs, negative emotions such as loss of control and irrationality will lead to the loss of any rationality in betting.
privacy5: Humans can only view very limited historical data and cannot perform multiple complex calculations, so most bets are wagered by luck, and if the odds difference is calculated the human win rate is less than 50%.
privacy6: About IRGT investment and strategy criteria.
privacy7: Each investor has a total of eight consecutive wrong chances according to the IRGT strategy, that's is the use of the double betting method, for example when you bet on 1$ and lose money, then the next round needs to be 2$ to bet till the profit amount is 80%
privacy9: The core of IRGT is to guarantee that each investor gets 100% profit, and there is the possibility of losing money in lottery betting, so IRGT has developed a loss compensation plan to ensure the investor is not risky.
privacy10: The possible options for pay, out are.
privacy11: IRGT will be 80% of the daily income, ( profit sharing created by investors and rolling commission) into the insurance capital
privacy12: pool, used for compensation, strictly enforced every day, no matter whether there is a loss or not to pay, will be executed,
privacy13: increase the capital pool every day, so that the capital pool increases daily, the anti-risk ability is getting higher and higher when the member needs to pay, IRGT will draw the corresponding amount from the capital pool for compensation.
